If it's a dragon, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules

That creature gets -12000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.): ► Each of your opponent's creatures gets -3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STRIKE BACK}-Darkness (When a Darkness card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose a nature creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ During your opponent's turn, whenever your opponent would put a creature that costs more than the number of cards in their mana zone, put it into its owner's mana zone instead. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ Whenever you cast a spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw up to 2 cards. Then discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one to your opponent, add it to your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the revealed card is fire or nature, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Revolution 2: If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets "shield trigger" when added to your hand from your shield zone. ■ Revolution 0: If you have no shields, this creature gets +10000 power, "speed attacker" and "triple breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your light creatures. ■ Parallel Invasion: When one of your non-psychic light commands attacks, you may put this creature from your hyperspatial zone onto it. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, put a card from your hand into your hyperspatial zone, then tap all your opponent's creatures that have the highest power. At the start of your opponent's next turn, they don't untap.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Parallel Revolution Change: When one of your non-psychic water or darkness dragons that cost 5 or more attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature in your hyperspatial zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand. ■ Whenever you discard from your hand, each of your other multicolored creatures gets "slayer" until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Ultimate Evolution: Put on one of your evolution creatures. ■ Invasion: Fire Evolution Dragon (When one of your fire evolution dragons attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, choose 2 cards from your opponent's mana zone and put them into their owner's graveyard. ■ Meteorburn: When you put this creature, you may put 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, this creature breaks all your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger: Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution light or fire creature, put it, and put this creature on top of it. ■ Neo Evolution: You may put it on one of your light or fire creatures. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose a non-creature card in the battle zone and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 4 or more Giants, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Giants. ■ Triple breaker ■ When you put this creature, return up to 3 creatures from your mana zone to your hand. Then put up to 3 cards from your hand into your mana zone tapped.

card.name: Mad Rock Chester Romanov, Purgatory Wicked God

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for the number of cards in each graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. ■ Graveyard Galaxy Vortex evolution: Choose 3 darkness or fire creatures in your graveyard and put this creature on top of those creatures. ■ Meteorburn: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, cast a darkness or fire spell that costs 6 or less from your graveyard for no cost and put it on the bottom of your deck. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then destroy this creature. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, ignore the ■ ability above. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ You may summon this creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ You may draw a card at the end of your turn. If you do, discard a card from your hand. ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks you, you may destroy this tamaseed. If you do, put a water creature that costs 6 or less from your hand and it gets "blocker" until the end of your turn. At the end of this turn, return that creature to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution Change: Water or Fire Dragon that costs 3 or more (When one of your water or fire dragons that costs 3 or more attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent chooses one of their creatures that has the lowest power and destroys it: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.
